name: Vividus
description:
Vividus is a game about depression created by Robyn Choi and Kevin Yang using Unity, and is the winner of 3 categories for BC Game Jam 2018.

The objective at the start of the game is to click the squares that are turning dark before they become completely black. Try to keep this up for at least several seconds to progress to the next part (which will remain a secret until you get there).
